entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 late this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
